sentence.Network_en: Every organized patriarchal religion works overtime to contribute its own brand of misogyny ( Robin Morgan )
sentence.Network_cn: 每一种有组织的男权信仰都不遗余力地贡献出自身的厌女标记 ( 罗宾摩根 )

PerfectNetExp.abs: 厌女症（Misogyny）一直是中国社会文化结构方式之一，我们生活中的一切，几乎都打上了厌女症的烙印。从孔子的“惟女子与小人难 …

但我绝不会接受性别歧视和厌女癖（Misogyny）的训话，今天不会，永远不会，政府也绝对不会接受！有厌女癖的人是人格有缺陷， …

derivation.yuyuan_name: mid 17th cent.: from Greek misos 'hatred' + gunē 'woman'

entry.def: Misogyny is a strong dislike of women.

auth_sentence.content: But its misogyny is consistent with its traditional intolerance.
auth_sentence.res_content: But its misogyny is consistent with its traditional intolerance.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: But its misogyny is consistent with its traditional intolerance.

auth_sentence.content: But an odor of misogyny is in the air.
auth_sentence.res_content: But an odor of misogyny is in the air.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: But an odor of misogyny is in the air.

auth_sentence.content: Even his trademark misogyny has been toned down.

stems_affixes.word_buile: miso恨+gam婚姻+ist人→n.厌恶结婚的人
miso恨+ne=neo新+ism现象,状态→n.厌新,守旧
